snippet.title: "Requital"/"Волкодав" HD Playthrough Part 1
snippet.description:
Волкодав: Месть Серого Пса/Requital: Revenge of a Hero
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Russian Action RPG with With Witcher/Gothic Vibes
The setting is based on the fantasy novel "Wolfhound" ("Волкодав", 1995, by Maria Semyonova)  and the movie "Wolfhound of the Grey Hound Clan"(2006)/"Волкодав из рода Серых Псов"
According to the developers, part of the motivation in making Requital was to create an authentic 6th century Russian world for the player to explore. As such, the game veers away from anachronisms and modern fantastical elements like magic and mythological creatures. Instead, it is more centered on historical realism mixed with superstitions that existed in that period of Russian history
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Playthrough Part 1 :*Introduction *Vinitar's Castle
Прохождение  Часть 1:*Вступление *Замок Винитария(Людоеда)
